about_the_game:
In 2057 entertainment is not experienced but lived as injected nanobots react to your VR contact lens HUD to give pain and pleasure and where AI self learn and mutate to manage your daily life and fight crime and terror.

Overview

After years of subverting Internet and Grid scammers, you resign from the police and return home to take up a quiet IT job at a truck factory situated in a remote rural location.


Whilst at work a warning call from an old colleague alerts you to the danger of the Grid and contact lens HUD where it traps the wearer in an elaborate medieval illusion that controls humanity.

Quests

Embark on Quests relayed by an ex police colleague to acquire Nanobot skills and enable hacks aimed at stopping the Grid and its illusion.

Injected Nanobots

Working in conjunction with a person’s HUD, injected nanobots control body responses to improve health, give strength and skills which could not be easily obtained. Use these Nanobots and acquire skills to help you in the fight against the Grid.

The Illusion

Using the HUD and Nanobots the Grid has created an illusion that hypnotises humanity into believing they are living in medieval times where the use of any unauthorised technology identifies a person as a witch who must be hunted and killed.


As guns and vehicles are unauthorised technologies, their use carries great risks.

What Is Slaughter Bots?

Slaughter Bots is an action RPG survival game set in the future, in the year 2057 where you can play in either 1st or 3rd person in an open world of 400 SQ KM.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions only)
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 @ 3.8 GHz, Ryzen 3 - 1200, Intel Core i5 2400 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 285, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions only)
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz, Ryzen 5 - 1400, Intel Core i7-3770 @ 3.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
